No:  {{ doc.tra_control_number }}  


CERTIFICATE/REMITTANCE SLIP IN RESPECT OF
WITHHOLDING TAX ON RENT FEES
Name of TAXPAYER/WITHHOLDER:   {{doc.customer}}   

{% set cust_tin = frappe.db.get_value("Customer", doc.customer, "tax_id")| replace("-", "")|replace(" ", "") %}
TIN: {{ cust_tin[0] }} {{ cust_tin[1] }} {{ cust_tin[2] }}   {{ cust_tin[3] }} {{ cust_tin[4] }} {{ cust_tin[5] }}   {{ cust_tin[6] }} {{ cust_tin[7] }} {{ cust_tin[8] }}

Name of WITHHOLDEE.   {{doc.company}}   

{% set cmp_tin = frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "tin")| replace("-", "")|replace(" ", "") %}
TIN: {{ cmp_tin[0] }} {{ cmp_tin[1] }} {{ cmp_tin[2] }}   {{ cmp_tin[3] }} {{ cmp_tin[4] }} {{ cmp_tin[5] }}   {{ cmp_tin[6] }} {{ cmp_tin[7] }} {{ cmp_tin[8] }}

I hereby certify that, I have this date of  {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.posting_date, "dd")}}  Month of  {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.posting_date, "MMMM YYYY")}}  deducted prior to payment of Rent Fees in favour of the Commissioner of Domestic Revenue Department/Large Taxpayers Department withheld from the above named person as follows:
Gross Amount in  {{ doc.get_formatted("base_total", doc) }}  
Tax withheld at  10  % {% set wth_amount = doc.base_total * 0.1 %}  TZS  {{ frappe.format_value(wth_amount, {'fieldtype': 'Currency', 'options': 'TZS'})}}   

This payment is for the period covered from  {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.from_date) }} to {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.to_date) }}  

I further certify that the above withholding Tax has been/shall be REMITTED to the Regional Manager  ILALA/   Large Taxpayers Department in the monthly schedule of  {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.posting_date, "MMMM YYYY")}} .
